identity.sql: SELECT 1
SELECT 1, 2, 3
SELECT a, b, c FROM t
SELECT * FROM t
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x > 1
SELECT * FROM t ORDER BY x
SELECT * FROM t ORDER BY x LIMIT 10
identity.description: Select with ORDER BY and LIMIT

identity.sql: SELECT * FROM t ORDER BY x LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
identity.description: Select with ORDER BY, LIMIT and OFFSET

identity.sql: SELECT * FROM t ORDER BY x ASC
SELECT * FROM t ORDER BY x DESC
SELECT * FROM t ORDER BY x NULLS FIRST
SELECT * FROM t ORDER BY x NULLS LAST
SELECT DISTINCT x FROM t
SELECT ALL x FROM t
SELECT a AS x, b AS y FROM t
SELECT * FROM t AS t1
SELECT t.* FROM t
SELECT 1 WHERE TRUE
SELECT 1 WHERE FALSE
SELECT NULL
SELECT TRUE
SELECT FALSE
SELECT 1.5
SELECT -1
SELECT 'hello'
SELECT 'it''s'
SELECT x FROM t GROUP BY x
SELECT x, count(*) FROM t GROUP BY x HAVING count(*) > 1
SELECT x FROM t GROUP BY 1
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x NOT BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x LIKE '%foo%'
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x NOT LIKE '%foo%'
identity.expected: SELECT * FROM t WHERE NOT x LIKE '%foo%'

identity.sql: SELECT * FROM t WHERE x ILIKE '%foo%'
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x IS NULL
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x NOT IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT * FROM t WHERE x IN (SELECT y FROM s)
SELECT CASE WHEN x > 1 THEN 'a' ELSE 'b' END FROM t
SELECT CASE x WHEN 1 THEN 'a' WHEN 2 THEN 'b' ELSE 'c' END FROM t
SELECT (SELECT 1)
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 1 AS x) AS t
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 1 AS x UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS x) AS t
WITH cte AS (SELECT 1 AS x) SELECT * FROM cte
WITH cte1 AS (SELECT 1 AS x), cte2 AS (SELECT 2 AS y) SELECT * FROM cte1, cte2
WITH RECURSIVE cte AS (SELECT 1 AS x UNION ALL SELECT x + 1 FROM cte WHERE x < 10) SELECT * FROM cte
SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2
SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2
SELECT 1 INTERSECT SELECT 2
SELECT 1 EXCEPT SELECT 2
SELECT 'hello' || ' ' || 'world'
DESCRIBE t
EXPLAIN SELECT 1
